content.raw: I have tried the ./deploy.sh -t as well, it comes up with the same issue. Note that in the error message I posted above, it starts off with two warnings but also contains two errors, which do stop the script from executing. It doesn't terminate the script, it just hangs there indefinitely.
content.html: I have tried the ./deploy.sh -t as well, it comes up with the same issue. Note that in the error message I posted above, it starts off with two warnings but also contains two errors, which do stop the script from executing. It doesn't terminate the script, it just hangs there indefinitely.
